donor_name: PROVISIONAL INSTITUTIONS OF SELF GOVERNMENT IN KOSOVO
outputs.output_descr: The intervention addresses directly by extending rapid support to vulnerable individuals and communities that are at risk of social exclusion
outputs.crs_descr: Public sector policy and administrative management

outputs.output_descr: The objective of the project is to contribute to a stable multi-ethnic environment within post-returns communities in Kosovo, through community development initiatives and socio-economic activities; increased involvement of the central and municipal level structures, as well as the strengthening of community structures and accountability mechanisms.

project_title: support reintegration, self-reliance and language use
